Game suggestion
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2011 Topics (Year of the Henger): Game suggestion
By mean2you on Wednesday, September 7, 2011 - 06:10 am:

Hey,

Couldn't really think of a good title but i am
looking for a good game to play that is similar to
Monster Rancer 2 or Digimon World, a
breeding/raising type of game.

Digimon world was very fun because not only can
you raise/battle other digimon, there is quite a
big evolution tree and it also had an rpg element
to it.

Thanks for any suggestions.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, September 7, 2011 - 09:17 pm:

Tough question. I tried other games released in the PSX generation of games that were supposed to be similar, and simply didn't find them very engaging.

By mean2you on Thursday, September 8, 2011 - 03:09 am:

Yeah, and now a days they really don't have anything
that compares. Seems like developers don't want to
put the effort into those type of games anymore when
they can make a lot more money just rehashing the
same stuff over and over.

By Lao Tse on Tuesday, September 13, 2011 - 02:13 am:

I never bothered with Digimon World 1 ironically because of the monster's finite lifespan, something that never bothered me too much about the MR games (although you can still PvP with monsters when they can't be used here).

I'm still waiting for Tecmo to do another Monster Rancher title. MRDS2 is good and all, but the content eventually wears thin (also, was shocked to see its abysmally low metacritic or whatever rating, yikes!)
